channel.title: Merc rework (with contract)
channel.description:
•Mercenary
[color=Yellow]Passive 1[/color]: extra files - know your contracts exact class at the beginning of everyday. You may not vote up your target and you must always vote pardon on your contract. You may not kill your target either.
[color=Yellow]Passive 2[/color]: finishing what i started - if your contract dies then you will commit suicide in two days unless you kill your contracts killer.(If you do manage to kill your contracts killer then your _“stand guard”_ ability will be refilled) ________________ [color=yellow]Day ability 1[/color]: Contract - select a player to contract. If you don’t contract someone in the first 3 days then you will randomly be given a contract. You cannot contract any unique classes, only exceptions are [color=red]CL[/color] and [color=purple]Assassin[/color],they can be contracted. If you attempt contracting a unique player then you will get a message saying you can’t
[color=yellow]Day ability 2[/color] : paying attention - know who visits your contract tonight [4 uses] ____________ [color=yellow]Night ability 1[/color]: stand guard - prevent all visitors from you and your contract, if your contract is jailed then the prince cannot exe that night. [4 uses]
[color=yellow]Night ability 2[/color]: revenge - attack a player that accused your target, if your first contract dies then you can kill anyone. (if you manage to kill your contracts killer then you will be randomly given a new non-unique contract, can only be reassigned a new contract once) [2 uses] _________________ [color=Yellow]Win con[/color] - have 1 of your contracts survive until the end of the game
_______________ [color=black]Notes[/color]: this new mercenary allows you to pick a contract of your choice in 3 days. Allowing the player to get a feel of the players before contracting. Not being able to contract prince was my main goal because then prince would out every game. If your contract does die then you have two days to redeem yourself by killing your contracts killer. This can seem hard but with your day ability 2, you can get a better idea on who it is. Now you might think that this is heavily favor to BD because most of the time your target will die to cult or unseen but if a knight,hunter or even a poss controlling someone then you have to kill them to redeem yourself. If you successfully do kill them then you will be rewarded a random non-unique target as your contract. The RNG new target is a punishment and reward for when your contract dies.
